alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 3:15PM MST until August 23 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 314 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Iron Springs, or 9 miles northwest of Prescott, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Prescott, Yavapai Campground and Iron Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
